body.name: Linksys AC3000 Smart Mesh Wi-Fi Router for Home Networks, MU-MIMO Tri-band Wireless Gigabit Mesh Router, Fast Speeds of up to 3.0 Gbps, Coverage of up to 3,000 Sq Ft, Up to 25 Devices MR9000 (Renewed)
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 13 hrs 7 mins

climatePledgeFriendly.details: Pre-owned Certified: Electronics products are inspected, cleaned and (if applicable) repaired to excellent functional standards. Buying Pre-owned extends a product's life, reducing e-waste and raw material extraction.

features: Provides up to 3000 square feet of Wi-Fi coverage for 25 plus Wireless devices
Works with the Velop mesh Wi-Fi system to easily expand Wi-Fi coverage up to 6000 square feet and eliminate dead zones
Works with existing modem, simple setup through Linksys App; Power supply 100 to 240 volt - 50 to 60 hertz; Output: 12 volt, 2A
Enjoy 4K HD streaming, gaming and more in high quality without buffering
Tri band Wi-Fi speeds upto 3Gbps (5 GHz/ 1733 Mbps) + (5 GHz/ 867 Mbps) + (2.4 GHz/ 867 Mbps)
When used with Velop Mesh Wi-Fi system, router serves as master node
body.description: Tri band Wi-Fi speeds upto 3Gbps (5 GHz 1733 Mbps) (5 GHz 867 Mbps) (2.4 GHz 867 Mbps)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy Set up
reviews.reviewText: Excellent product. Used multiple features in different capabilities.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Bought as a second box, works perfectly for my needs!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Fast and easy setup with app
reviews.reviewText: Overall satisfied with speed and setup but WIFI range a little disappointing. At fifty feet from base Wi-Fi down to 40% better than my old cable router but not what I was hoping for.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 20, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Turbocharged my WiFi
reviews.reviewText: This router is an upgrade from my previous one which was probably 6 or 7 years old. This thing appears to be rock solid and pretty potent. The software is great. Its nice to be able to look at all the devices and give them custom names and icons. This router has given me speeds that are above what I pay for at Cox. That is if its true or not using the SpeedTest app. I NOW can stream videos back to my bedroom from this router which actually lives in an enclosed stereo cabinet with glass door. This cramped area doesn't seem to hinder the signal.Very happy so far. Note: this product was factory refurbished. Still performs great!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 5, 2021
reviews.reviewText: This if the best router that I've ever owned. Speeds have been consistent with few connection issues. The range estimates seem to be accurate, I have coverage all over with two added nodes. Everything is on one network now, I don't need any extenders or have to change to connect to different extender locations. WiFi 5 is great. Wish I could have future protected with WiFi 6, but it'll be fine for the next several years and beyond.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fast and steady signal
reviews.reviewText: Fairly easy to setup, but signal is not sttong enough for a 1500 sf house need to use range extender

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 10, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Bang for your buck
reviews.reviewText: I live out on the country and dont have bad to the bone internet but I wanted something that would give me great range for all my google stuff to control the house I am vary happy with this I live in a long house and it covers the whole thing. Now if you need a faster one you going to have to pay a ton more this one allowed me to do wireless stuff for xbox ,oculas ,smart tv. So big thumbs up for the money and I loved that I used my phone to set it up instead of a pc easy for me

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 6, 2020
reviews.reviewText: Complete and utter garbage. Amazon Renewed is shameful. This arrived dirty and already opened (the “renewed” box had a seal that was already broken). The router setup was fine, but the router itself drops connectivity every hour. Sheer torture working from home with this garbage. Customer service was terrible, loathe to help, and won’t do anything to get a replacement out quicker. Brutal.
